tp:docstring.p: An interface exported by client applications which are able to handle incoming channels.

method.name: HandleChannel
method.tp:docstring: Called when a channel handler should handle a new channel.

arg.name: Bus_Name
arg.tp:docstring: The bus name of the connection and channel

arg.name: Connection
arg.tp:docstring: The object-path of the connection that owns the channel

arg.name: Handle_Type
arg.tp:docstring: The type of the handle that the channel communicates with, or 0 if there is no associated handle

arg.name: Handle
arg.tp:docstring: The handle that the channel communicates with, or 0 if there is no associated handle
